name: Assembloids XE
overview: An entry in the ABBUC Software contest 2013, Assembloids XE is a puzzle game in which you are presented with one quadrant of a face image in the center square and a countdown timer. There are different colors and different shapes to the faces; you can match the shape, color or both in adjacent squares, but you can't match a quadrant on top of one in the same position. Completing a full face clears that square for future use.
